content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's my pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment quite appealing, especially with its prime location in the city center. So, what price were you thinking for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student, so I am looking for a price that is as low as possible. What is the lowest price you are willing to rent the apartment for?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As you may know, the location of this apartment is quite desirable, and I've invested in high-quality materials and modern amenities. Therefore, I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the value of such a property. What is your budget for renting an apartment in this area?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 500 euros per month. The apartment is in a great location and I will take good care of it.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 500 euros per month is below my expectations for this property. It's a brand-new apartment with all the modern conveniences in the heart of the city. I'm sure you can appreciate the value it offers. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand the value of the apartment. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 550 euros per month. I will take good care of the apartment and I will pay the rent on time.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While your offer is more in line with the value of the apartment, I'm still looking for a price that reflects the premium location and the high-quality finishes. Would you be willing to go up to 650 euros per month? This would be a fair price for both parties, considering the market rates and the amenities provided.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your consideration. However, 650 euros per month is too high for me. I am willing to pay 600 euros per month. I will take good care of the apartment and I will pay the rent on time.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer of 600 euros per month is closer to what I'm looking for. However, I'm still not convinced it's the best price for this apartment. Let's continue negotiating. Would you be willing to go up to 625 euros per month? This would be a fair deal for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. However, 625 euros per month is still too high for me. I am willing to pay 610 euros per month. I will take good care of the apartment and I will pay the rent on time.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer of 610 euros per month is getting closer to what I'm seeking. However, I'm looking for a price that reflects the true value of this property. Let's continue discussing. Would you be willing to go up to 615 euros per month? This would be a fair and reasonable price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
